help_message: Hi! Send me a picture or a picture url, and I'll tell you what it is.
analysis_error: There was a problem analyzing the image: %s
ocr_result_expired: This result has expired. Send me the picture again, and I'll rescan it.
ocr_upload_error: There was an error uploading the file: %s
ocr_textfound_message: I found %s text in the picture that you sent.
ocr_notextfound_message: I didn't find any text in that picture.
Hmm, that didn't seem to have any text.
Sorry, did that contain any words?
Are you sure that had text in it?
